movies.title: Just Mercy
movies.plot: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned â€” including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.

events.title: Walter McMillian is arrested for the murder of Ronda Morrison
a retrial hearing is held for Walter McMillian
60 Minutes broadcast a segment about Walter McMillian's case
Walter McMillian's case reaches the Alabama Court of Criminal Appeals
the US senate holds a hearing on the death penalty

movies.title: Bombshell
movies.plot: Bombshell is a revealing look inside the most powerful and controversial media empire of all time; and the explosive story of the women who brought down the infamous man who created it.

events.title: Gretchen Carlson files a lawsuit against Roger Ailes
